description.value: Your forceful blows shatter objects with ease. While you are raging, your melee @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Strike]{Strikes} ignore 5 points of an object's Hardness. If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Devastator] class feature, you instead ignore 10 points of an object's Hardness.
